animeDescription: The 60-second film features six fierce samurai who rush through a post-futuristic megalopolis using the most unpredictable means of transport (including a kite!) as to make it on time for the last order at their favorite pub.  (Source: Production I.G)
animeStaff: [['Kitakubo Hiroyuki', ['Director', 'Storyboard', 'Key Animation']], ['Ogura Hiromasa', ['Art Director']], ['Kise Kazuchika', ['Key Animation', 'Animation Director', 'Character Design']], ['Takeuchi Atsushi', ['Layout']]]
